channel.title: I have some questions with using whonix with vpn
channel.description: I saw wiki that say using whonix with vpn is harmful for security. In that wiki, it seems that using a vpn "in the whonix workstation" is bad. Is what I understood right? And if it right, then, what about using vpn in out of whonix workstation? I used vpn in window os not in the whonix os(I mean out of virtual box). Is it effective for security or is it harmful?

item.title: I have some questions with using whonix with vpn
item.dc:creator: Kravmaga
item.description:
HulaHoop:

useless in most cases and effective against the most clueless censors only

Thanks a lot. It’s comforting to have at least basic security thanks to whonix.

Read full topic

item.title: I have some questions with using whonix with vpn
item.dc:creator: Kravmaga
item.description:
HulaHoop:

A VPN inside Whonix is useful in some cases. There is nothing dangerous about it or else we wouldn’t have documented it.

Then what about vpn outside whonix? do nothing in both bad and good?

Read full topic

item.title: I have some questions with using whonix with vpn
item.dc:creator: Kravmaga
item.description:
TNT_BOM_BOM:

Windows is horrible Operating System to begin with for your anonymity, you cant assume being anonymous while using windows. So using VPN or without doesnt add up any good to anonymity on windows or mac or any proprietary OS.

Could it be serious problem? I had already done it.

Read full topic

item.source: I have some questions with using whonix with vpn

item.title: I have some questions with using whonix with vpn
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
Kravmaga:

I saw wiki that say using whonix with vpn is harmful for security. In that wiki, it seems that using a vpn “in the whonix workstation” is bad. Is what I understood right?

No, using VPN at all rates is bad thing to your anonymity.

Kravmaga:

And if it right, then, what about using vpn in out of whonix workstation?

Bad , thats why Tor exist.

Kravmaga:

I used vpn in window os not in the whonix os(I mean out of virtual box). Is it effective for security or is it harmful?

Windows is horrible Operating System to begin with for your anonymity, you cant assume being anonymous while using windows. So using VPN or without doesnt add up any good to anonymity on windows or mac or any proprietary OS.

Whonix – 6 Jun 20

Host Operating System Selection - Whonix

Host Operating System Selection, OS Threats to Privacy and Security

Read full topic
item.source: I have some questions with using whonix with vpn
